snippet: FALKSON--Dr Eric J.,84, passed away on Monday, April 25th, at his home. A Memorial Service will be held at 1pm on Sunday, May 1st, at the Brotherhood Synagogue on Gramercy Park South. Eric was born November 2, 1931, in Germany to Dr. Frederick and Rose Falkson. He graduated from Colgate University and studied medicine at New York Medical College. He practiced medicine as a board certified internist and cardiologist for over 50 years, and was affiliated with Beth Israel Hospital. An avid reader and sports fan, Eric mostly enjoyed spending time with his family. He is survived by his wife Gloria, his children Frederick and Lisa, and his only grandchild Jon. 1/3
